description: Least nontrivial exponent e such that n is a substring of n^e.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller and Zak Seidov, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000. Terms up to a(1000) from Reinhard Zumkeller.
Index entries for sequences related to automorphic numbers
mathematica: f[n_] := Block[{k = 2}, While[ StringPosition[ ToString[n^k], ToString[n]] == {}, k++ ]; k]; Table[ f[n], {n, 0, 87}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 09 2005 *)
prog: (Haskell)import Data.List (isInfixOf)a045537 n = 2 + length   (takeWhile (not . ((show n) `isInfixOf`) . show) $ iterate (* n) (n^2))-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 29 2011
author: _Erich Friedman_
